passages.text:
Greeting ''Junra'', you have returned from your Journey.

[[You forgot to bow before me. -> WarriorResponse]]
[[Yes, I have returned. -> MagicianResponse]]
[[Why are you here alone, old one. -> MatyrResponse]]

links.name: You forgot to bow before me.
Why are you here alone, old one.

passages.name: Begin

passages.text:
(set: $Opinion_Logar to $Opinion_Logar - 1)
You have been gone for too long. Our society has changed. The custom you spoke of no longer exist.

[[How can that be. You must be lying -> MergeConversation]]
[[Liar!, our tradition has been honored for more millenias. -> MergeConversation]]

Script:
Variable["Warrior"] = Variable["Warrior"] + 1

links.name: How can that be. You must be lying
Liar!, our tradition has been honored for more millenias.

passages.name: WarriorResponse

passages.text:
(set: $Opinion_Logar to $Opinion_Logar + 1)
But the world is no longer as it has been in your memories. 

[[Changes are that of the world natures. We must always adapt. -> MergeConversation]]

[[To speak of such changes knowing that they are imminent. An unforseen change must had happened here. -> MergeConversation]]

Script:
Variable["Magician"] = Variable["Magician"] + 1

links.name: Changes are that of the world natures. We must always adapt.
To speak of such changes knowing that they are imminent. An unforseen change must had happened here.

passages.name: MagicianResponse

passages.text:
(set: $Opinion_Logar to $Opinion_Logar - 1)
Worry not for me, ''Junra''. If I were you, I would fear more about myself than this old one.

[[You must have been troubled by my appearance, I wish to hear your story old one!. -> MergeConversation]]
[[Tell me your story old one, let me share your burden. -> MergeConversation]]

Script:
Variable["Matyr"] = Variable["Matyr"] + 1

links.name: You must have been troubled by my appearance, I wish to hear your story old one!.
Tell me your story old one, let me share your burden.

passages.name: MatyrResponse

passages.text:
I am ''Logar''. I am ... no I was a Warrior under ''The Kasi''. Now, I am but a simple scholar from the ''H'inja''.

[[What nonsense are you spouting. How dare you leave ''The Kasi''.-> ThreatenLogarStatsChange]]
[[Your words troubled me. How could you decided to leave ''The Kasi''. -> QuestionLogarStatsChange]]
[[What happened that made to leave ''The Kasi''. ->(End: CheckLogarEnd)]]

links.name: What nonsense are you spouting. How dare you leave ''The Kasi''.
Your words troubled me. How could you decided to leave ''The Kasi''.
What happened that made to leave ''The Kasi''.

passages.name: MergeConversation

passages.text:
Enough of your insult.
[[(End: CheckLogarEnd)]]
Script:
Variable["Opinion_Logar"] = Variable["Opinion_Logar"] - 1
Variable["Warrior"] = Variable["Warrior"] + 1
passages.name: ThreatenLogarStatsChange

passages.text:
You seem to understand well.
[[(End: CheckLogarEnd)]]
Script:
Variable["Opinion_Logar"] = Variable["Opinion_Logar"] + 1
Variable["Magician"] = Variable["Magician"] + 1
passages.name: QuestionLogarStatsChange

passages.text:
I hate you afterall.
Conditions:
Variable["Opinion_Logar"] <= 0
passages.name: (End: Logar Hate)

passages.text:
I will let you know when the time come.
Conditions:
Variable["Opinion_Logar"] > 0
passages.name: (End: Logar Like)
